text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Southern Red Sea Zone | native_name = Zoba Debubawi Keyih Bahri ዞባ ደቡባዊ ቀይሕ ባሕሪ | native_name_lang = | other_name = Regione del Mar Rosso Meridionale | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = Assab 1880.jpg | image_alt = Historic image of Assab | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | mottoeng = | image_map = Southern Red Sea in Eritrea.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Southern Red Sea Region in Eritrea | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | parts_type = | parts_style = | parts = | p1 = | p2 = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Assab | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = Administrator | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 27,600 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 398,073 | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = ER-DK | website = | footnotes = }} The Southern Red Sea Region is a region of Eritrea. The capital city is Assab. The Southern Red Sea Region extends over along Red Sea coast but is only around wide. It forms the major part of the Danakil Desert. The region has the following subregions: Are'eta Subregion, Central Denkalya Subregion and Southern Denkalya Subregion. Category:Regions of Eritrea Category:1996 establishments in Eritrea
title: Southern Red Sea Region
